titleStmt.title: The paire of northerne turtles whose love was firme till cruell death, depriv'd them both of life and breath. To a new northerne tune, or, A health to Betty.
Northerne turtle.

publicationStmt.publisher: for F. Coules, dwelling in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: In two parts, each with woodcuts at head; part 2 also published separately under title: The northerne turtle.
Another edition (with a first part added, with title: The paire of northerne turtles) of STC 18671.3, published in 1628 with title: The northerne turtle.
Formerly STC 24370; identified as STC 24370 on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1475-1640", reel 1040.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
